meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sizable.
meanings.sent1: The sizablenesses of the cake portions pleased the party guests.
meanings.sent2: She admired the sizablenesses of the new furniture in the living room.
meanings.sent3: The sizablenesses of the puppy's ears made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The sizablenesses of the mountain range took her breath away.
meanings.sent5: The sizablenesses of the rainbow made it a stunning sight.

meanings.definition: The extent or magnitude of being sizable.
meanings.sent1: We marveled at the sizablenesses of the giant pumpkin at the fair.
meanings.sent2: The sizablenesses of the library collection impressed the students.
meanings.sent3: The sizablenesses of the ice cream scoop made it a challenge to finish.
meanings.sent4: The sizablenesses of his kindness were beyond measure.
meanings.sent5: The sizablenesses of the ocean waves were mesmerizing.
